location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from G W Dickson, Constantinople to Colonel Sir Lewis Pelly

mods.abstract: Letter, marked confidential, regarding his having attempted to trace the whereabouts of some photographs belonging to Pelly and his discovery that they had already been sent to him.The letter goes on to discuss George Goschen (1st Viscount Goschen)'s work in Constantinople; Dickson's views on Turkish politics and policy which he feels is aimed at setting the European powers against each other; and key facts to be considered when looking at Turkish affairs.
